content:
As of the morning of March 17, there is no Russian ship in the Black and Azov Seas.

About thisreportThe Navy of the Armed Forces, reports the Armyinform.

As it is noted, there are three enemy ships in the Mediterranean, including two carriers of the Caliber, a total volley of up to 12 rockets.

During the day, in the interests of the Russian Federation, the passage of the Kerch Strait was made:

  • 8 vessels to the Azov Sea, none of them moved from the Bosphorus Strait;
  • To the Black Sea - 9 vessels, two of them continued the movement in the direction of the Bosphorus.

The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Human Life at the Sea of 1974 (Solas), switching off automatic identification systems (AIS).

Earlier the Armyinformreported14 Shahaneda was shot down in Odesa region.
title: Three enemy ships are on duty in the Mediterranean Sea
description: This was reported by the Navy forces of the Armed Forces, reports the Armyinform. As noted, on ...
author: Army Inform
